title: Will Saudi Arabia schools stay open in Ramadan 2026? Ministry of Education new rules explained
summary_full: Saudi Arabia's Ministry of Education has outlined attendance rules for Ramadan 2026, ensuring schools remain open with adjusted timings to support fasting students. While emphasizing academic continuity, the ministry plans a 28-day break, including the Eid al-Fitr holiday, to balance spiritual observance with learning. Strict adherence to schedules is mandated.
